name: Pink Bubba
description: Pink Bubba is a mostly indica strain that is said to combine genetics from Bubba Kush and Pink Kush. Earthy pine flavors lead the way with slight floral highlights that bring out this strain’s sweet notes. Perhaps best saved for evening use, Pink Bubba delivers a body-melting blast of physical relaxation alongside dreamy euphoria.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Euphoric, Hungry, Tingly, Stress, Pain, Insomnia, Depression, Muscle Spasms, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Anxious
